titleInfo.title: Metropolis Monte Carlo simulation modelling MoMo molecules as hard spheres on calcite

mods.abstract: [This Metropolis Monte Carlo simulation](http://pc1.pages.ub.uni-bielefeld.de/pub/2020-MMC-MoMoHardSpheres/MoMo.html?a) treats dimolybdenum tetraacetate molecules, referred to as MoMo, adsorbed on the (10.4) surface of the bulk insulator calcite.
